backend/templates/.description: Only base.html template exists currently. Other templates (index.html, aws/*.html, errors/*.html) listed in subtask-2-2 do not exist yet and may be created in future subtasks.

backend/static/img/logos/.description: Logo files (7 total: 4 Rackspace + 3 DIR) were in backend/static/img/logos/ directory, not backend/static/images/. These files were already removed from the current branch - the directory no longer exists. The base.html template was already updated in subtask-2-1 to remove logo references and use CloudOpsTools text branding instead.

The spec appears to have been generated from a different version or a larger repository. No S3 bucket URL updates needed since the file doesn't exist.

*.sh.description: No shell scripts exist in the main codebase. The files listed in subtask-3-4 (monitor-health.sh, run-tests.sh, setup.sh, start.sh, start-staging.sh, stop.sh, test-ci.sh, quick-rollback.sh, scripts/setup_database.py) do not exist. docs/.description: The docs/ directory and all documentation files listed in subtask-4-3 (architecture.md, Implementation-Action-Plan.md, PRD-Production-Readiness.md, Rollback-Procedures.md, SPECIALIZED_TOOLS_PATTERN.md) do not exist in this codebase.
